title: 未解明地点记录
content:
> **前言：**本頁為專門記錄 SCP 基金會多年來發現的低威脅性異常地點。雖然在本文件列出的所有地點獲准保護及掩蓋措施，但都與潛在的異常起因無足夠緊密的關係，或被認為沒有足夠高的收容或研究需要以獲得完全的特殊收容措施文件編制。這些地點將來變得有用或必要時，本列表可用作知識資源。
> —— ██████ █████ 博士，Site ██，收容主管

[[[log-of-anomalous-items|异常物品记录]]]与[[[log-of-extranormal-events|超常现象记录]]]同样完成了编译。

----
//**注意：**请将新的条目写在页面底部，而非插在开头或中间。//

**未解明地点 UE-673264**
**地点描述：**一间学校教室，其内所有的几何图形都比正常的少了一边。三角形仅有两边，但依旧具有三角性质。圆变为点，而点 [数据删除]
**收容日期：**1984-06-24
**所在地：**英国，萨里，圣塞德里克小学，4 号房间
**安全协议：**教室的门窗均被堵死，并安置了防盗警报。

**未解明地点 UE-941712**
**地點描述：**一個半徑 5 米的圓形區域。所有在區域內絆倒的人類無論其母語或對百事可樂品牌的知識，均會自發地以英語說出「孩子，我真希望我現在有罐美妙的冰冷百事可樂」。
**收容日期：**1968-02-29
**所在地：**在星際空間，靜止相對於太陽在大約與地球相同的高度和傾角。
**安全協議：**基於此區域的天文研究難度和受影響區域不穩定的性質，能預測未來受影響區域的建模軟件仍處於開發階段。目前，在社交媒體上有關上述詞組的發言被監控，保安人員有權自行決定執行記憶消除。

**未解明地点 UE-404816**
**地点描述：**一片面积为 250493.29km² 的地区，其中包含整个密歇根州。在该地区内，所有道路工程 / 道路维护所需要的时间均为正常所需的约三倍。
**收容日期：**1904-04-06
**所在地：**美国，密歇根州
**安全协议：**目前并无必要。密歇根州的居民将之视为该地区变换无常的天气所导致的正常影响。

**未解明地点 UE-656688**
**地点描述：**一座小型工厂，其内的温度恒定在 -273°C（0 开尔文）。
**收容日期：**2017-01-24
**所在地：**苏格兰，埃尔郡，埃尔
**安全协议：**基金会买下了该工厂，用于冷储存及开展热力学实验。

**未解明地点 UE-867920**
**地点描述：**一座树屋，位于一栋已被遗弃的房子之后。树木上雕刻有“SCP 俱乐部”的字样。在树屋内发现了三个盒子。第一个盒子上标有“106”，其中存放着一个 G.I.Joe 的可动人偶，被粗暴地涂成了黑色。第二个盒子上标有“682”，其中放有一具蜥蜴的骨架。第三个盒子上标有“999”，其中放着一杯橘色的 Jell-0 果冻。尽管这可能意味着潜在的收容突破情况，但该地区除此以外并无异常。
**收容日期：**2017-06-24
**所在地：**美国，密西西比州
**安全协议：**房子与树屋被一同拆除。三个盒子及其内容物当前已被存储。不需要进一步行动。

**未解明地点 UE-537968**
**地點描述：**一片約 27 平方米的區域，其中火焰無法存在。任何已有的火焰會在進入區域時自發熄滅，沒有物質能在區域內點燃。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**美國，加利福尼亞州，優勝美地國家公園
**安全協議：**基金會前哨在區域上建築，並偽裝成護林站。建築物標示為非吸煙區。

**未解明地点 UE-345456**
**地點描述：**一片 2 x 2 平方米的沼澤，導致任何進入區域的人類頭頂出現美國牛蛙 //（Lithobates catesbeiana）//。牛蛙在離開區域時會消失。
**收容日期：**2009-07-01
**所在地：**馬里蘭州，████████
**安全協議：**地產被收購，並停止向公眾開放。

**未解明地点 UE-807488**
**地点描述：**一间摄影棚，内含绿幕背景、聚苯乙烯制成的岩石模型与一架土星 5 号着陆舱的复制品。所有的道具上均标记有未知的字符。
**收容日期：**1969-06-21
**所在地：**月球，宁静之海
**安全协议：**虚假信息运动（目前已可自行维持）。

**未解明地点 UE-387168**
**地点描述：**一片面积 4.9^^2^^km 的土地，其中可以听到 Starship 的歌曲“We Built This City”以约 115 分贝的音量播放。音乐的确切源头尚未确认，但那似乎是由天空所发出的。歌曲将不断重复，期间没有暂停。
**收容日期：**19██-01-08
**所在地：**利比亚西南部一处荒无人烟的土地，临近阿尔及利亚边境。
**安全协议：**该区域已被警戒线隔离，对外标为毒性化学品废料场。

**未解明地点 UE-521392**
**地点描述：**{{一座废弃的建筑。每隔五年，大约会有 1000 台无异常的 20 世纪早期打字机在其中突然出现。所有关于这座建筑的文字说明似乎都呈现为 12pt 的 Pica 字体。}}
**收容日期：**{{2016-02-08}}
**所在地：**{{████████}}
**安全协议：**{{该建筑已被修缮。在经过异常性检查后，打字机被通过一个固定的网络链接线上售出。}}

**未解明地点 UE-464176**
**地点描述：**田纳西州，克莱顿高中内的一间教室。当从教室内的窗户向外看时，可以发现一个巨大的黑色无定形物体漂浮在天空中。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**美国，田纳西州，克莱顿
**安全协议：**以石棉污染为由封锁了该教室。
**笔记：**到 2016 年 7月 27 日为止，窗外的物体似乎变得越来越大，或者越发靠近窗户。其意义未知。

**未解明地点 UE-175936**
**地點描述：**一片直徑 5 米的圓形區域。任何處於圓形的人類對象會體驗到幻視，觀看圓形之外的空間時會變成火星天空和地面的實時景象。所有效果在對象離開圓形時停止。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**威爾士，卡迪夫
**安全協議：**前台公司「星與星座天文館（Stars and Constellations Planetarium）」在異常周圍建築。異常地點收容在「只供職員使用」區域內。

**未解明地点 UE-539040**
**地点描述：**一栋澳大利亚境内的公寓楼。一旦有任何被认为是真空吸尘器、或是能够作为真空吸尘器的物品进入该楼，其受到的重力将即刻下降至约百分之一倍。在离开公寓楼后，这种效果并不会消失。该异常在一则新闻报道“男子牵着扫地机器人在空中飞翔”后被确认。
**收容日期：**2015-07-13
**所在地：**新南威尔士州，悉尼
**安全协议：**基金会通过一家前台公司收购了该公寓楼，现在有一名特工驻守其中。

**未解明地点 UE-826208**
**地点描述：**一间尺寸与布局皆正常的厨房，位于一家意大利高级餐厅内。菜单上所有被标为“素食（vegetarian）”的食物都将不完全地自行转变为肉类，即使该菜品实际上是一道不含肉的非素食菜肴。
**收容日期：**2017-05-01
**所在地：**美国，纽约，詹姆斯敦
**安全协议：**该餐厅被基金会收购，目前作为前台门面及收入来源之一。菜单上所有的“素食”均被调整为大写字母，但通过小写的“L”来代替大写的“I”。

**未解明地点 UE-252944**
**地点描述：**一个 7.4m x 9.2m 的地坑，其中充满了一种橙色的液体。该液体的似乎与芬达饮料的配方十分相似，而后续的检查证实了这一点。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**火星，潘多拉峡地
**安全协议：**NASA 卫星拍摄到的图像已被更换。潜伏在 NASA 的基金会人员将会重定向所有正在进行的任务与未来计划的行动，从而避开这一区域。

**未解明地点 UE-251872**
**地點描述：**一個美國迪士尼主題樂園的完美複製品，出現於 1955 年 7 月 16 日，完全由鋼材建構。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**月球
**安全協議：**所有包括該地點的 NASA 圖像和公眾照片被編輯。互聯網活動被持續監控以防信息洩露。

**未解明地点 UE-137440**
**地点描述：**一座公园，内含网球场、游乐设施、野餐区，其中的标识均用英文写就。如果对象从东出口离开公园，他们将会来到美国加州的███████。从西出口离开则会将对象送至位于日本埼玉县████████的一座一模一样的公园门前。加州版本的公园没有西出口，反之亦然。
**收容日期：**██05-██-██
**所在地：**加州，███████与埼玉县，████████
**安全协议：**两个出口都因维护而被关闭。基金会在公园内建立了微型设施，用于安保及运输物品。
**笔记：**我们已经用这个地方转运好几年的东西了，结果你现在才想起来写记录？——Dr. ███████

**未解明地点 UE-270592**
**地点描述：**一架 ████ 牌衣柜的内部。相较于可从其外表推测的大小，衣柜内的空间实际上大了约 2500 倍，其中栖息着多种腐生霉菌，据信生存在该区域的木制镶板之上。对这种镶板的钻孔作业证实其深度几乎是无限的，没有任何向下的限制。
**收容日期：**2017-03-██
**所在地：**推测位于异次元空间。作为入口的衣柜被搬送至 Site-34。
**安全协议：**由于其内大量的真菌具有高致病性，进入的人员必须预先佩戴 Mark-III 型呼吸设备。目前用于存储不易腐烂的设备。

**未解明地点 UE-194656**
**地点描述：**属于同一星座的约 78 颗恒星，具体坐标未知，组成了基金会的图标（一个巨大的环形，可见三个明确的箭头指向中央）。尽管如此，管理员与 O5 议会依旧多次声明他们是在发现该星座之前设计图标的。
**收容日期：**2015-02-23
**所在地：**双子星座的正南方向。
**安全协议：**由于其表现形式过于抽象，目前不需要收容该星座。

**未解明地点 UE-731552**
**地點描述：**一片直徑 ~2.3 公里的不規則區域，從那裡可以看到天上有兩個太陽。
**收容日期：**1998-██-██
**所在地：**巴基斯坦，哈蘭沙漠
**安全協議：**地區被封鎖，解釋為進行核試。

**未解明地点 UE-599472**
**地点描述：**一座结构类似于圆形露天剧场的建筑，但内部没有任何座椅。每隔一段随机时间，幕布就会拉开，其后出现一群状似头足类生物的机器人。这些机器人携带着无法识别的物品，据推测为乐器。在幕布合拢之前，它们会演奏一会儿音乐。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**木卫四
**安全协议：**信息已被封锁。基金会欲在可行时派遣探月车调查。
**笔记：**虽然我们的望远镜实际上不能捕捉到音频，但我们根据视频复现的音乐可谓是“十分悦耳”。

**未解明地点 UE-809632**
**地点描述：**一栋公寓楼。从每一扇窗户往外都能看到巴黎不同地区的天际线。每一扇窗户都能看到埃菲尔铁塔。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**美国，德克萨斯州，巴黎
**安全协议：**该公寓楼已被收购。所有前居民均已被遣散，并经受了 A 级记忆消除。

**未解明地点 UE-254016**
**地点描述：**一条河流，中间缺失了六米长的一段。测试表明，河流中的水会在断口的一端（Alpha 端）消失，随后在另一端（Beta 端）出现，两端之间的部分不存在任何河流的痕迹。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**印度，████████
**安全协议：**区域周围竖起了电围网，并竖起了禁止入内的告示牌。
**笔记：**研究表明，从 Beta 端流出的水中含有月球土壤的成分。机动特遣队 Gamma-4 已被派往月球寻找消失的河流片段。

**未解明地点 UE-689840**
**地點描述：**一片 2.23 x 2.23 平方米的正方形區域。一旦人類站在區域內 5 分鐘或以上，所有在接著的 120 小時內遇到對象的人類會體驗到嗅覺上的幻覺：對象有草莓的氣味。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**佛羅里達州，普朗特城
**安全協議：**區域被種植了一片草莓田，由基金會前台公司「草莓和哈密瓜種植園（Strawberry and Cantaloupe Plantations）」維持。

**未解明地点 UE-405888**
**地点描述：**一座位于南太平洋的岛屿，不属于任何列岛。最高海拔 2054m，面积约 12.5km²。该岛屿上定期有火山喷发现象，但喷出的液体为碳酸钠、二氧化碳、FD&C 40 号红的水溶液。在爆发期间，可以听到类似于儿童笑声的声音。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**东经 ███°██，南纬██°██
**安全协议：**该地区已从地图上抹除，且有人员在周围巡航避免外人接近。由于该异常位置较为偏僻，无需进一步的行动。

**未解明地点 UE-943856**
**地点描述：**一大片位于高海拔地区的常青树林。此区域的植物与无机物异常地分泌液体。扰乱此地的土壤会让它们产生羊奶或牛奶，撞击岩石则会使其产生水。此区域内松树的树皮分泌的不是树脂，而是酒。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**希腊，█████████山
**安全协议：**此区域已被指定为一种罕见松鼠的国家野生动物保护区，禁止平民进入。树林的唯一入口处设置了次声波驱逐器与守卫。

**未解明地点 UE-346528**
**地点描述：**一 4m x 5m x 10m x 7m 的空间，其中所有的物体似乎都表现出了四维性质。
**收容日期：**2014-05-17
**所在地：**西班牙，加那利群岛，圣克鲁斯德特内里费
**安全协议：**地点周围建立了一座仓库，时刻都有至少三名保安监控确保无人闯入。

**未解明地点 UE-271664**
**地点描述：**UE-271664-A和UE-271664-B是位于不同国家的两个不同加油站的公共厕所。两者由相同的材料建造，大小尺寸相同，并且包含相同品牌的马桶、水槽和其他浴室设备。当一个重量小于2千克的无生命物体掉在一个卫生间的地板上时，其将立即消失，并在同一地点的另一个卫生间重新出现。
**收容日期：**2012-04-04
**地点：**俄勒冈州的波特兰市（-A），英国的利物浦市（-B）
**安全协议：**这两个地方都以储藏室的名义被锁起来，并建造了新的、非异常的公共厕所。标准的低威胁监测（LTM）设备已被安装，以监测异常的重新出现。

**未解明地点 UE-883424**
**地點描述：**一大小為 500x300x250 米的不規則體積，裡面只能說中世紀法語。試圖說其他語言會導致無法呼氣。
**收容日期：**2001-07-03
**所在地：**23°N, 271°W ~1500 米之上
**安全協議：**航班被重新定向以避開異常。

**未解明地点 UE-327808**
**地點描述：**一個鄉村牧場。牧場內所有的建築和裡面所有的事物都是一致的藍色。儘管沒有明暗、顏色與不透明的對比，人類完全有能力辨別受影響範圍內的外形，有時比在異常外面更有能力。
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**內華達州法倫
**安全協議：**牧場被收購，並停止對公眾開放。牧場的衛星圖像被編輯。

**未解明地点 UE-675408**
**地点描述：**██████ 高中的202室。进入这个房间的新生█████ ██████完全变成了隐形人，但对象的肠道菌群和身上的所有其他微生物及其随身物品仍然可以被看到。此异常现象在对象离开后停止。
**收容日期：**2012-09-09
**所在地：**邦戈，缅因州，美国
**安全协议：**所有目击者都被进行了B级记忆清除。██████ 的父亲被安排在纽约奥尔巴尼从事一份经济上有利可图的工作，导致█████ 家庭搬迁。他和202室都被观察了五年，在此期间没有发现新的异常情况。

**未解明地点 UE-193584**
**地點描述：**一個地下礦井（約 2 公里深），裡面持續下雨。礦井不會淹沒。
**收容日期：**████-██-█
**所在地：**亞利桑那州 ████，穿過猶他州邊境
**安全協議：**所有出入口被封鎖，貼上標誌聲明「危險！礦井不穩定！」

**未解明地点 UE-177008**
**地点描述：**爱荷华州████田野中间的一个木棚。任何进入棚子门的东西都会被传送到Site-35地下一层的走廊里。
**收容日期：**1999-06-14
**所在地：**████, 爱荷华州

[[# 601616]]**未解明地点 UE-601616**
**地点描述：**一座面积约0.44平方公里的波罗的海无名岛屿，岛上无动物生命迹象。所有被移到岛上的陆生动物将逐渐失去生命力，并在数天内脱水死亡。早期收容期间中，人类受试者暴露在岛屿中约15分钟内，情绪逐渐消失，两小时后对外界刺激失去反应。其中一名受试者暴露在项目16小时后离开并痊愈，尽管其中50%的受试者在暴露了4.25个小时后彻底无法恢复，并在没有医疗支持的情况下死亡。2018年以后，岛屿的异常性质随时间推移正在不断减弱。截止目前其阈值是之前的两倍。
**收容日期：**1944-05-08
**所在地：**54°57' N 15°32' E
**安全协议：**该岛将被伪装为北约武器测试场地，周围两公里的区域被列为禁区。全球超自然联盟应该根据《科隆协议》执行安全警戒
**笔记:** 有关此地区的地理位置被列为机密 3/3457/Broken Horizon.

**未解明地点 UE-735840**

The spring is home to multiple previously-unknown non-anomalous species of thermophilic archaea.

**所在地：**████████, CO, USA
**安全协议：**The Foundation has purchased 24 acres of land surrounding the hot spring and built a private cabin there, with the cave entrance disguised with a storage shed. The property has been fenced off from backcountry hiking and skiing, and two personnel are stationed at the cabin to perform research on the spring's native microbial life.

If any researchers are caught attempting to steal chocolate from the beehive, they will be severely disciplined. - Facility Director Arthur Hackett//

* All others will be tied to the main track.
After completing manifestation, an unidentified trolley will manifest on the track before the switch and will start moving forwards at a speed that is always fast enough to kill everyone tied to the main track.

**未解明地点 UE-211180**

Anomaly generally reported in low-light conditions (early morning, twilight, rainy weather, etc.). Exact frequency of occurrence is unknown. The highest number of sightings in a day is ███ on 1999-██-██, when █████ █████ students left the school grounds en masse to investigate rumours of a 'ghost'. Resulting disruption to school activities and traffic incidents brought the location to the Foundation's attention.

**安全协议：**Pedestrian crossing moved ███ meters from prior location under cover story of road improvements. Students and staff given counseling, medical attention and Class-B amnestics where necessary; drivers compensated for damage. No further sightings reported.

**地点描述：**A two story house where all water on the property is always at 95°F (35°C), regardless of the conditions surrounding the property. Built in 1949, the house has had all plumbing replaced at least once, and as such the house itself is not the source of the anomaly.
**收容日期：**11/20/1959
**所在地：**██████████, Pennsylvania, USA
**安全协议：**Under ownership of Dr. Marques, who resides there.

**未解明地点 UE-740128**
**地点描述：**A one story rental log cabin that causes people inside to forget important items, such as wallets and phones, which leads to the person who left the item returning and then forgetting another item, causing subjects to return over and over until they are reminded about their lost objects.
**收容日期：**████-██-2017
**所在地：**█████, Michigan, USA
**安全协议：**The cabin is to remain closed at all times, with cameras around the building in order to prevent break-ins.


**未解明地点 UE-664192**
**地点描述：**An area with multiple tall buildings made entirely out of flesh and bones. The material appears to originate from multiple species of //Diprotodon//, and are kept alive through unknown means. The size of the buildings range from 3 to 50 meters in height, and streets are placed between the buildings in an incoherent fashion.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**[COORDINATES REDACTED], Great Victoria Desert, Australia
**安全协议：**Due to the remote location of the anomaly, only minimal containment is required. Satellite photography containing footage of the location is to be altered.

**未解明地点 UE-539894**
**地点描述：**A large hemispherical granite formation, approximately 100 meters in height.
When a human subject comes into contact with the surface, said subject will undergo a psychological reformation, resulting in a full personality change. However, other traits, such as the subject's memories and identity, appear to be untouched. The altered personality always resembles that of the person who last came in contact with the surface.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**[REDACTED], Arizona, USA
**安全协议：**The area is being guarded by personnel from nearby Site-██. Personnel are not allowed to come within 20 meters of the rock formation unless cleared by personnel of Level 3 Clearance or above.
**Note:** The identity of the people affected by the anomaly prior to discovery is unknown; however, the personality of the last person (presumed civilian) affected before Foundation discovery has been analyzed, and efforts are being made to locate them.

**未解明地点 UE-402859**
**地点描述：**An anomalous rectangular space approximately 4x5x4 meters in size that is constantly at a temperature of about 704ºC. On June 1st, 2023, celebrity ███████ ███████'s mansion mostly burned down as a result of the spontaneous development of this space's properties, as it was the kitchen.
**收容日期：**2023-06-02
**所在地：**███████, ██, USA
**安全协议：**Proper amnestics given, and a cover story of an arsonist was disseminated. Land bought by Foundation for testing purposes and Area-511 built nearby.

**未解明地点 UE-333883**
**地点描述：**An eight acre farm in which all vegetation was replaced with potatoes. Any vegetation brought in will be converted to potatoes. Any seeds will become potato seeds.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**████, Spain
**安全协议：**Superb Potato Company farms has been registered as the owner of the plot of land. Intruders are to be arrested and all plants are to be confiscated.
**Note:** //The potatoes are non-anomalous and delicious - Senior Botanist Castañeda//

**未解明地点 UE-487184**
**地点描述：**A restaurant named Burger Kingdom. Whenever someone attempts to cook in the kitchen, a voice will harshly criticize whatever meal is cooked. The more mistakes are made, the louder the voice will become. The highest recorded volume was 154 decibels.
**收容日期：**2003-03-05
**所在地：**Ohio, ██████, USA
**安全协议：**The restaurant is to remain closed and any offers to sell are to be denied. Trespassers are to be given amnestics and removed from the location.

**未解明地点 UE-918651**
**地点描述：**A cornfield in which all known flora can be grown, including those that can not normally grow in that environment. The exception is corn, which cannot be grown in the area.
**收容日期：**1983-10-15
**所在地：**Jamestown, Virginia
**安全协议：**The area has been blocked off via a barbed wire fence. The surrounding areas are to be monitored for unauthorized use.

**未解明地点 UE-129304**
**地点描述：**A large patch of land that, when any vehicle enters, will cause multiple small white rabbits to manifest above the vehicle every three minutes. The number of rabbits appearing at the same time is five on average, however manifestations of up to 20 rabbits at once have been observed. All rabbits dissipate once the vehicle has exited the area.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**[REDACTED], Malaysia
**安全协议：**Task Force MY0253 (“Bunny Catchers”) are tasked with removing the rabbits on the area and administering amnestics to civilians who encounter the anomaly.

**未解明地点 UE-169630**
**地点描述：**An In-N-Out Burger restaurant where the burgers seem to always be pink (uncooked), no matter how long they’ve been cooked for. Investigation of the kitchen has revealed nothing wrong with any of the kitchen appliances.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**A town in California.
**安全协议：**Restaurant shut down under the guise of bugs in the kitchen. All workers were given amnestics. The customers naturally forgot about the anomaly on their own.
**Note:** All In-N-Outs should be placed under surveillance in the event that another one has the same (or a similar) anomaly.

**未解明地点 UE-268376**
**地点描述：**A back storage room in the former building of Madame Tussauds Wax Museum in ████, ██ in which if a Michael Jackson wax figure is put inside and left for ten minutes the figure will start dancing and singing, with audible backing vocals and instruments, any of the late singer's hits.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**████, ██
**安全协议：**Witnesses were given Class-A Amnestics. Madame Tussauds has been moved, making the likelihood of an event occurring improbable. However, the room remains under surveillance.

**未解明地点 UE-114527**
**地点描述：**A 20x10x4 kilometer region in the upper troposphere of Neptune. Every █-██ weeks, two equally sized squadrons of fighter aircraft, consisting of █-██ P-51 D-30 and Bf-109 K-4 aircraft respectively, will materialize on opposing long ends of the region and engage in aerial combat, with aircraft dematerializing shortly afterwards. No pilots have yet been observed.
**收容日期：**1989-08-27
**所在地：**Upper Troposphere, Neptune
**安全协议：**A small aerostat observation probe has been deployed above the region. No further containment is currently needed.

**未解明地点 UE-825345**
**地点描述：**An abandoned wood shed that is filled with 150 //Acer laurinum// leaves approximately every 24 hours through anomalous means. This effect does not take place if there is no space available for the leaves to manifest.
**收容日期：**1997-05-17
**所在地：**Nay Pyi Taw, Yangon, Myanmar
**安全协议：**Destroyed in an earthquake. Testing has shown no anomalous effects.

**未解明地点 UE-816064**
**地点描述：**A sidewalk where pedestrians are only able to walk while their eyes are closed. Attempting to walk with open eyes invariably causes said pedestrian to expel a large amount of liquid resembling vomit from the mouth via unknown means.
The composition and appearance of the substance is completely unrelated to the contents of the affected person's stomach.
**收容日期：**2019-██-██
**所在地：**Jeju, South Korea
**安全协议：**The surrounding area was purchased and is being monitored for further anomalous activity.

**未解明地点 UE-364675**
**地点描述：**An exact copy of a defunct kebab restaurant originally located in London, England. Exploration by autonomous drone reveals the inside of the building to not only be fully furnished but also fully stocked with restaurant supplies despite its location. The original building that the anomaly appears to be based on was shut down in 2004 and has shown no sign of anomalous activity.
**收容日期：**2013-11-14
**所在地：**The bottom of the Weber Deep, Banda Sea, Indonesia
**安全协议：**Foundation agents are embedded in various nautical research institutes to divert civilian research away from the area. The original restaurant has been bought by Foundation front company and converted into a safe house.
**Note:** Radiocarbon dating done 2019-02-05 shows that the building is at least 4,000 years old.

**未解明地点 UE-119221**
**地点描述：**A small lake that when frozen over, footprints will appear occasionally on the ice spelling out the name of a person that will die within the next five days.
**收容日期：**2017-03-22
**所在地：**█████ ████, ID, USA
**安全协议：**Snow is to be shoveled bi-daily. The location is also fenced off and labeled as private property. No security procedures are needed during late spring, summer, and early fall.

**未解明地点 UE-490400**
**地点描述：**UE-490400 is a retail park that extends itself infinitely when an individual attempts to leave the area through the entrance gates. Witnesses describe victims "turning upside-down" followed by them vanishing, along with a persistent scent of plastic and gasoline. "Generated" extra stores in the extended version of the park are usually copies of existing stores, although these can deviate at times. Deviant stores include "Baker Food!", "Quiche Quiche Quiche", "The Long Way 'Round", "Mallwart", "Tobacco High School" and "This Is An Infinite Retail Park".
Individuals that enter this area can leave by passing back through the gates.
**收容日期：**2015-██-██
**所在地：**Madison, Wisconsin, USA.
**安全协议：**Little effort is required to contain UE-490400's effect. A sign has been placed on the entrance gate's adjacent wall that promises a $50 fine for exiting through it. Cameras monitoring the gates capture any individual to enter the infinite section, who will be retrieved and amnesticized.
**Note:** Who exits through the entrance anyway? - Dr Stuart

**未解明地点 UE-282412**
**地点描述：**A basement where items that have disappeared within a 10 mile radius manifest.
**收容日期：**1987-06-05
**所在地：**South Boston, VA, USA
**安全协议：**The house above the location has been purchased by the Foundation. Items are to be disposed of after checking for significance in local crime. Tupperware and left socks may be disposed of immediately.

**未解明地点 UE-700560**
**地点描述：**UE-700560-A and UE-700560-B are two areas of land within a 1km distance of each other wherein satellite imaging shows the presence of two non-existent structures, one of which has never existed (a large mansion in a secluded pasture, UE-700560-B), and one of which formerly existed, but has been demolished (an abandoned house located on a nearby side street, UE-700560-A). The latter, formerly existing structure was at one time an anomalous structure, however the structure inexplicably lost its anomalous properties in 2010 and was demolished the following year. Satellite surveillance shows minimal activity occurring at either location, but personnel on the ground report seeing neither the structures, nor subjects coming or going from these areas.
**收容日期：**████-██-██
**所在地：**Walkertown, NC, USA.
**安全协议：**The pasture land designated UE-700560-B has been purchased by the Foundation and is currently used as a surveillance outpost to monitor activity at either site, itself designated Site-B. Due to the secluded location of both sites and low likelihood of civilians being affected by the anomaly, no action against residents living in the area is authorized.

**未解明地点 UE-561348**
**地点描述：**A collective designation for any "Jamba Juice" brand beverage chain operating inside the nation of Indonesia. All franchise chains appears to instill a memetic sense of "dread" and "terror" to approximately 0.005% of costumers who interacted with any of the instance. The effect cannot be removed with any treatment and subjects would often be driven into mental breakdown.
**收容日期：**2019-03-29
**所在地：**Jakarta, Indonesia
**安全协议：**As per 2019-07-03, the Indonesian Jamba Juice operation have been bought by a Foundation front company, which then shut down all 4 existing chains. A stand built and contained in Site-██ still exhibits the anomalous property.

**未解明地点 UE-66328**
**地点描述：**A Pokémon-themed store that sells t-shirts, plush toys, and plastic toys depicting different Pokémon from the series. Once purchased and brought outside the store, the purchased item will transform into a ball of light that reveals an item of the same type that was bought except it now takes the form of the Pokémon Ditto. Only merchandise of said Pokémon is immune to this effect.
**收容日期：**2018-12-20
**所在地：**████████, Japan
**安全协议：**The Foundation has purchased the store and placed a front business in the place of the original store. The merchandise for sale has been sent into storage at Site-██, and all items related to the Pokémon series is prohibited from this area.

**未解明地点 UE-773217**
**地点描述：**The stall farthest from the entrance of a men's room in a ████████ brand movie theater that, when the door is opened, will automatically flush the toilet. Whilst the water is refilling in the bowl, the pelt of a small mustelid drenched in the blood of either a small rodent or songbird will rise into the bowl.
**收容日期：**2020-11-26
**所在地：**███████, Massachusetts
**安全协议：**An "Out of Order" sign has been applied to the door, and caution tape has been wrapped around the stall. Any person who opens the door should be administered Class-A Amnestics, and the pelt should be checked for anomalous properties.

**未解明地点 UE-824317**
**地点描述：**Five square meters of land in the ██████ Desert of Nevada which, when stood in, will cause extreme vertigo and nausea until the affected individual is moved out of the area.
**收容日期：**2020-12-19
**所在地：**██████ Desert, Nevada
**安全协议：**Small house built on top of the location, windows boarded up and door blocked.

**未解明地点 UE-029305**
**地点描述：**A crater (.5km diameter) in the Scottish highland, formed by a massive kinetic force converting into thermodynamic detonation. Interior is lined with plant detritus and ash. A badly damaged wooden door was discovered at the crater's center, with a note nailed to its front reading "KRUG [[[another-goddamn-magic-system | KNOCK]]] TOO HARD SORRY".
**收容日期：**2021-02-14
**所在地：**10km north of ██████████, Scotland
**安全协议：**Note and door kept in containment, environmental restoration efforts underway.

**未解明地点 UE-71135**
**地点描述：**A LAN gaming center sponsored by GoI-078 (##purple|Arcadia##). It’s a minor nexus for video game-based Anomalous Items and SCP objects and presents Nexuses’ qualities, including a population of ten people.
**收容日期：**2023-01-24
**所在地：**Seoul, South Korea
**安全协议：**Every Anomalous Object or SCP object not bound to the Nexus Confines is to be brought to Site-15 for analysis. The Foundation bought the site and it is kept as a center for the study of minor electronic anomalies.

**未解明地点 UE-55984**
**地点描述：**A cave in the small village of ██████, France with various cave paintings dating back as far as 2.3 million years. Among the drawings one would expect, several interpretations of figures in lab coats and jumpsuits standard to SCP Foundation personnel are present along with several crude depictions of the SCP Foundation logo.
**收容日期：**1997-03-03
**所在地：**██████, France
**安全协议：**Due to the location presenting no danger aside from a small information breach, security is minimal. The parts of the cave containing the SCP related drawings are walled off to the public under the guise of being unstable. They are accessible to study given approval by one staff member of level-2 clearance or above. The remaining area of the cave is now operating as a tourist site "Special Cavern of Paris" as a low-maintenance form of income. Any members of the public caught trying to infiltrate the roped off areas of the cave are to be taken into custody, questioned, and then released after given appropriate amnestics.

**未解明地点 UE-55112**
**地点描述：**A small area of land at Montauk, New York was accidentally discovered on February 19 by Dr. █████ █. Hawley in which all photos taken depict a massive amount of compression, despite being roughly the same file size as a high quality image. Any photos taken within an area of around 50 square meters will display varying degrees of compression, ranging from 50 to 4 pixels per centimeter (ppcm). Additionally, the photos taken will not compress any organic matter captured in the image, resulting in an effect similar to focusing a camera on a single position. The affected area seems to shift every few hours, but stays within a one kilometer diameter circle.
**收容日期：**2021-02-19
**所在地：**New York, United States
**安全协议：**The area of land affected should be tested daily using Rettru Mini hidden Spy Cameras, positioned around the radius of land described previously. Access will be cut off via a cover story that sharks infest the waters around the land and that quicksand covers the entire beach; care should be taken to ensure no individuals wander into the anomalous zone, and even greater care not to release any media taken of the area. Any individuals who may appear are to be monitored to ascertain whether they are of any degree suspicious of the region and/or if they take any form of media away from the area. Should any media be taken of the region, the individual and any accomplices may be taken into custody, where the captured images and video will be deleted permanently via use of █████.█████.exe at Site-█.

**未解明地点 UE-196224**
**地点描述：**Island containing what appears to be a relatively small modern town, complete with signs of current habitation.  Little information is available, as any attempts to actually reach the island result in the island appearing to move away from the observer, remaining at roughly the same distance regardless of speed.  This occurs regardless of the method of travel used and will also affect air traffic.  Testing revealed that the anomalous nature of the island will also affect skydivers.  If multiple people attempt to reach the island simultaneously, all of them will experience the same effect.
**所在地：**South Pacific Ocean
**安全协议：**As the island gets very little traffic and is effectively self-containing, security is nearly non-existent.  Those experiencing the anomaly generally believe themselves to be hallucinating, often from exhaustion.  This is facilitated by a misinformation campaign denying the existence of an unreachable island.

**未解明地点 UE-237179**
**地点描述：**Small, locally-owned thrift store.  Contents are completely normal and display no anomalous properties.  However, every item for sale was either lost or sold by Jane Edwards, a certified public accountant from Portland, OR.  Worthy of note is that Jane Edwards has never visited the store or even the city in which it can be found.  Items arrive at the store through a series of unlikely yet apparently coincidental events.
**所在地：**Galway, Ireland
**安全协议：**Foundation personnel installed as employees of the store.  Original owners and employees placed under Foundation surveillance.  As the provenance of the items cannot be easily discovered by the public, no further security protocols are necessary at this time.

**未解明地点 UE-234872**
**地点描述：**UE-234872 is a single bedroom hunting lodge. UE-234872 is constructed of pine wood and has tinted glass windows. The entire interior of UE-234872 is painted white and decorated in a minimalist style. UE-234872 is a Class B cognitive hazard and deteriorates the thalamus of any persons present.
**收容日期：**2017-07-2
**所在地：**[REDACTED], Forest of Dean, [REDACTED] Drive, Christchurch, Coleford, Gloucester, UK, GL██ 7██
**安全协议：**UE-234872 has been purchased by the Foundation. All unauthorized individuals attempting to enter the premises are to be turned away and administered amnestic treatment if required. On-site security must wear non-Foundation clothing and be armed with concealed weapons.

**未解明地点 UE-641092**
**地点描述：**UE-641092 is a abandoned corn maze. Between October 1st and November 1st multiple small child like entities can be seen within the UE-641092.
**收容日期：**2013-10-8
**所在地：**[REDACTED], Illinois
**安全协议：**The land surrounding UE-641092 has been purchased. All unauthorized individuals attempting to enter the premises are to be turned away and administered amnestic treatment if required.

**未解明地点 UE-561967**
**地点描述：**UE-561967 is a small village and is constructed in the Western Rustic style used for structures in the western United States, dated early to mid-1800s. Any individual present will exclaim that it's 'hotter than hell's basement' and will often point out that the location is 'a ghost town'. The settlement contains no individuals and appears abandoned. Individuals within a 1 km radius will express the desire to engage in a duel via firearms with any person they have major difficulties with.
**收容日期：**2017-12-29
**所在地：**Death Valley, California. Specifically the exact geographical center.
**安全协议：**The Foundation has inserted personnel into the nearby populace and disinformation campaigns were administered to create the widespread belief that death via escalated temperatures and wild animals is a given in the centre. Place has been investigated and fenced off to prevent anomalous activation.

**未解明地点 UE-343434**
**地点描述：**A small hunting cabin in a remote section of [REDACTED] National Park.  No signs of wildlife (of any kind) can be seen within 50 meters of the cabin.  The exterior walls and doors show claw marks from an extremely large bear.  The depth, length, and spacing of the claw marks suggest that they were made by a fully-grown cave bear.  However, the cabin was built in the year 2000 and the cave bear has been extinct since the previous Ice Age.
**收容日期：**3-14-2021
**所在地：**Pacific Northwest United States
**Security Protocols:** The cabin is built for occupancy by between 3 and 5 people.  However, only 2 agents are deemed necessary for containment.  Anyone straying into view of the cabin is to be turned away and informed that access is restricted due to the area containing breeding grounds for endangered species.
**Note:** //Agents stationed at the location occasionally report hearing sounds of bears outside the windows in the middle of the night.  Night-vision and thermal cameras were authorized, but no evidence of any bears has been discovered.  Bears already in the region avoid the location, as do all other animals.// Dr. Somerset

**未解明地点 UE-BM3**
**地点描述：**An area of indeterminate size, located around the deepest point of Lake Tanganyika. Drinking glasses of various shapes and sizes will spontaneously appear, filled with a red liquid that will promptly dissipate in the surrounding waters. The liquid is composed mainly of alcohol, tomato juice, and other ingredients commonly used in the recipe for the cocktail known as a Bloody Mary. Experimentation showed that performing a "Bloody Mary challenge" (Vocalizing "Bloody Mary" several times in front of a mirror) will cause the objects to appear in the location after a small delay.
**收容日期：**13/12/2020
**所在地：**Lake Tanganyika, Southern Africa
**Security Protocols:** Glasses are to be extracted from the lake and disposed of on a yearly basis. Given the volume of the Lake Tanganyika, no other measures are necessary.

**未解明地点 UE-86475**
**地点描述：**Conference room in a luxury hotel. Anyone entering the room will have auditory hallucinations of a type of music they find enjoyable. These hallucinations are unique to each individual. To date, no two people have ever reported hearing the same song at the same time. The music does not appear to have any anomalous properties in and of itself; an urge to dance is regularly reported, but this has been proven to be a normal reaction.
**收容日期：**12/6/2019
**所在地：**Kansas City, MO
**Security Protocols:** An error has been introduced into the hotel's computer systems that causes the room to be shown as already reserved at all times, making it impossible for hotel staff to allow the room to be used. Foundation personnel are to hold meetings of some sort in the room at irregular intervals, to maintain the facade of normalcy.

**未解明地点 UE-678414**
**地点描述：**Building with no windows or doors. Entry can still be gained to the building, however a suspected memetic effect will become apparent. At the time of writing, any Foundation personnel who enter the building cannot remember how they got in. Attempting to observe or film entry to the building causes observing personnel to be unable to recall how they entered, as well as corrupted video.
**收容日期：**2-16-2015
**所在地：**██████, Florida.
**安全协议：**Building under surveillance. Any corrupted video is to be taken as a perimeter breach, and is to be investigated.
**Note:** //If we could figure out a way to consistently enter the building, I bet we could set up a safe house here.// -Researcher Vance

**未解明地点 UE-333333**
**地点描述：**A small spatial anomaly that is in a storage room in Biological Containment Area ██████. From the outside, the room appears to be a small storage room. But from the inside, the room is a large containment room that is usually used to contain SCPs. A thaumaturgical luminescent glyph is situated in the center of the room. Writings around the glyph reads "Delphinidae rituals" No other anomalies are discovered. Objects previously in the room are presumed lost.
**收容日期：**1-11-2023
**所在地：**Biological Containment Area ██████, Department of Cetacean Research and Containment.
**安全协议：**Security cameras are placed in the room to monitor the glyph. SCPs are NOT to be contained in this room. Any personnel doing so will be demoted to janitorial work. Storage equipment can be stored inside the corners of this room.
**Note:** //As always, dates before months. And please put stuff in here, it's free storage.// - Dr. Daysbeforemonths, Head Researcher of SCP-██████

[[# clean]]**未解明地点 UE-379990**
**地点描述：**An apartment devoid of any interior furnishing. The room gives off a faint smell of peanut butter. According to the landlord the apartment had been rented to the "Department of Abnormalities", but the keys were never collected.
**收容日期：**2007-06-21
**所在地：**Classified
**安全协议：**Apartment was purchased. No further actions necessary.

**未解明地点 UE-███████**
**地点描述：**A 2x3m room located inside of an apartment in [REDACTED]. When a subject press their ear into the wall they gain the ability to hear all conversations happening in a 100m radius around the location. With enough practice, subject can concentrate to a single conversation with perfect clarity.  Coincidentally, UE-███████ is located right above an underground GOI-███ (██████ ██████ ████████) base.
**收容日期：**██-██-████
**所在地：**[LEVEL 4 ACCESS REQUIRED]
**安全协议：**[LEVEL 4 ACCESS REQUIRED]

**未解明地点 UE-347216**
**地点描述：**A 1.4km² area of desert in the state of California. All vehicles operating in the affected zone will only be able to move at a maximum speed of fifteen miles per hour. Attempting to bypass this limit will result in the vehicle spontaneously combusting.
**收容日期：**23/04/2009
**所在地：**California, USA
**安全协议：**A fence was built on the perimeter of the area. Trespassers are to be directed away from the area, under the claim that the area is private property. Due to the remoteness of the location, no further actions are necessary.

--**未解明地点 UE-9261521**
**地点描述：**A 20x20m space walled off from the rest of Site-115 after a major reconstruction and deliberately left unused for future expansion. The space has been converted into a makeshift bar titled "D's Dive" and occupied by the site's D-class personnel as an unauthorized gathering spot, accessed through a compromised ventilation duct. The space appears to be under an antimemetic effect, possibly the residue of SCP-████.
**收容日期：**3-16-2022
**所在地：**Site-115, █████████
**安全协议：**D-class personnel involved is to be disciplined. The space is to be cleaned and the walls are to be broken down. Proposals submitted to the Site Director for possible uses of the space.--
**Note**: No such location was found in Site-115. The researcher involved in writing this entry is reprimanded for spreading misinformation. Entry marked for deletion.

**未解明地点 UE-9721965**
**地点描述：**A abandoned Consolidated PBY Catalina flying boat on the uninhabited island of Mtsanga Tsoholé, Mayotte. Tail number is faded and undiscernible. When one enters the main fuselage via one of the many shattered windows or the blister ports, they are greeted with an exact recreation of an Edwardian-era ballroom. Exiting through any of the ballroom's doors returns the subject to the exterior of the PBY Catalina.
**收容日期：**6/15/1965
**所在地：**Mtsanga Tsoholé, Mayotte.
**安全协议：**--Agent stationed permanently on a floating outpost with appropriate provisions.-- Surveillance camera attached to the tail of the PBY. Should movement be detected, a Foundation patrol boat will be dispatched to apprehend and administer Class-A amnestics to affected individuals.

**未解明地点 UE-413069**
**地点描述：**An orchard containing several varieties of citrus trees. The fruits produced by these trees have aphrodisiac properties when consumed, the degree of which varies depending on the type of fruit. Limes induce slight but noticeable increases in arousal; lemons induce moderate increases in arousal. Tests involving grapefruits have resulted in [DATA EXPUNGED].
**收容日期：**08/13/1997
**所在地：**███████, Arizona, U.S.A.
**安全协议：**Area has been cordoned off with barbed wire. Use of area for scientific testing has been indefinitely banned as of ██/██/2018.

**未解明地点 UE-457782**
**地点描述：**A Dollar General location that appears to be a perfect replica of a location in ████, Georgia, identified by the damaged sign and exact positioning of merchandise and the Red Box machine outside. Location and related items appear unaffected by the environment.
**收容日期：**03/21/2004
**所在地：**Europa
**安全协议：**NASA-produced images and data of the location are to be removed from their database. Should information get leaked, a cover story of any images being an online joke has been devised in the unlikely scenario.


**未解明地点 UE-173885**
**地点描述：**A dental office where every empty space has been filled with teeth. The teeth do not match any particular person(s) living or dead and will be replenished upon removal.
**收容日期：**07/25/1997
**所在地：**████, Iowa
**安全协议：**The office has been bought by the Foundation under a front company and is closed to the public. A cover story that the office requires extensive renovations to fit the needs of new management has been circulated. Teeth may be used in testing or containment when necessary.

**未解明地点 UE-669823**
**地点描述：**A field clearing in which anyone that makes contact with the grass begins reflecting green light, making them appear green until they stop making contact.
**收容日期：**02/27/2021
**所在地：**███████ ██████, Italy
**安全协议：**The clearing has been fenced off and is under 24-hour surveillance. Foundation officials posed as forest rangers ward off any passerby civilians.

**未解明地点 UE-1113207**
**地点描述：**A door labelled "DoA" blocked by a refrigerator.
**收容日期：**21-05-2022
**所在地：**Site-115 cafeteria, █████████
**安全协议：**Left alone. Refrigerator stocked only with brands owned by Foundation front companies.

**未解明地点 UE-3031297**
**地点描述：**A large natural rock formation part of a hill. Approximately 12% of subjects who perceived the formation would exclaim "That is rather unusual, isn't it?" in an exaggerated "British" accent[[footnote]] In line with the popular cultural perception of the accent. [[/footnote]], regardless of the subject's ability to speak the English language or to vocalize.
**收容日期：**17-02-2004
**所在地：**Mount Batu Karang, West Java, Indonesia
**安全协议：**Direct access to the site is blocked or removed. Vegetation implanted to block all sightlines into the formation proves to be effective at negating the anomaly.

**未解明地点 UE-468040**
**地点描述：**An abandoned college dormitory room containing two bunk beds, one 1995 Zenith color TV, several appliances in various states of disrepair, and a large array of scattered clothing and food items suggesting former occupation by 4 males. The room is currently embedded in Mount Logan at a height of 4,096 meters and a depth of 64 meters, with limited access given via a small Foundation-made tunnel. Should less than 75% of UE-468040's surface be closer than 50 meters to the mountain's exterior at any time, it will spontaneously relocate to the interior of another mountain in western North America.
**收容日期：**12-03-2015
**所在地：**--Cardinal Peak, Washington, USA-- --Cofre de Perote, Veracruz, Mexico-- Mount Logan, Yukon, Canada
**安全协议：**The exit point for UE-468040's access tunnel has been covered with a locked, seemingly disused cabin, inspected twice annually. Dangerous conditions on Mount Logan's higher regions has thankfully resulted in only rare interactions between civilians and the site, which has been eventually disregarded in all cases.
**Notes:** DNA testing of hair found on clothing in the room and subsequent analysis of college records has revealed UE-468040 to be an exact copy of Dorm #████, ██████ Hall at the University of ████ as it appeared at some point between August 2003 and July 2004. Three of its residents from this time, █████ "██" ████████████, ████ ██████, and ██████ ███, claimed no knowledge of the anomaly and were released. The fourth resident, ██████ ███████, an avid hiker and mountain climber, could not be located due to their disappearance in April 2004. Notably, ████████████, ██████, and ███ claimed to have no memory of an individual named "██████ ███████". The implications of this remain under investigation.

**未解明地点 UE-445464**
**地点描述：**A small path made and used by local //Odocoileus virginianus// (white-tailed deer). When a human makes direct contact between their skin and the trail proper or contained foliage, they will become wholly convinced they are a juvenile male O. virginianus for a period of 8-512 seconds. This delusion persists regardless of information to the contrary, and may cause annoyance or anger in affected subjects, who will often give blatantly false and insubstantial arguments for why they are correct. Symptoms such as mild body dysmorphia may occur and persist for several minutes after the delusion subsides.
**收容日期：**22-11-2022
**所在地：**A section of Daniel Boone National Forest in Rowan County, Kentucky, USA
**安全协议：**The relevant trail has been blocked from access via a simple barricade. Additionally, signage warning about poison ivy and similar hazardous foliage has been placed around the nearby area highly encouraging the use of protective clothing such as gloves and long pants.

**未解明地点 UE-774766**
**地点描述：** A decommissioned prison wherein any successful escapes to the exterior via a cell-based window results in the immediate restraint of the person and their teleportation to the prison infirmary bearing the damage expected from a fall out said window, regardless of their actual liability to fall. Notably, these injuries are almost never fatal to prisoners except through exsanguination or sepsis.
**收容日期：** 04-12-1992
**所在地：** █████████████ █████ Prison, Krasnoyarsk Krai, Russia
**安全协议：** Converted into Foundation Site-840 and used for long-term storage of minor anomalous objects and low-security persons of interest.

**未解明地点 UE-038963**
**地点描述：** A 2 meter by 3 meter by 5 meter rectangular prismic region of space. All individuals who enter this space gain a detailed an fully comprehensive understanding of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bechdel_test Bechdel test][[footnote]] A test created by cartoonist Alison Bechdel that analyzes the agency and independence of women in a given story [[/footnote]] and its history, uses, strengths, flaws, and cultural reception.
**收容日期：** 13-12-2022
**所在地：** ██████ ███████ Book Store, Seaford, Delaware, USA
**安全协议：** Location purchased and converted into minor documentation storage site.

[[# micro-island]]**未解明地点 UE-550055**
**地点描述：** An island with a 2-meter radius and a single palm tree at the centre. The island is able to sustain all people inhabiting it (currently one). The island was classified as a micro-nexus due to heightened anomalous activity thematically linked to expectations of lone islands like the existence of treasure chests, undiscovered mysteries or exotic wildlife. All anomalous phenomenon is restricted by the island's small size.
**收容日期：** 2020-06-30
**所在地：** Pacific
**安全协议：** One Agent is always stationed at the island. Stranded people are amnesticized and rescued at the next opportunity.

**未解明地点 UE-328687**
**地点描述：** A former amusement park built in 1964 and abandoned in 1989. When snow is present to an average depth of at least 10 centimeters, footprints and hoofprints will appear at night in unobserved areas, most often 1 to 20 meters behind any humans or invasive animals. Observed hoofprints all follow a bipedal gait able to clear at least 5 meters in one stride and appear to indicate swift movement between various former booths and rides, while footprints either directly follow hoofprints or stay in open areas at least 2 meters from any attractions. Estimated weight of hoofprint cause and footprint cause are 120 kilograms and 30 kilograms respectively.
**收容日期：** 20-12-2022
**所在地：** ██ kilometers from █████, Moravian-Silesian Region, Czechia
**安全协议：** Covert monitoring system installed and regularly reviewed. Signs erected claiming unactivated explosive ordinances can be found in the area. Any subjects who manage to enter UE-328687 during activation conditions and witness its effects are to be swiftly located and amnesticized by nearby Site-236.

**未解明地点 UE-456838**
**地点描述：** An estate measuring 30 square kilometers and containing a house, small lake, field, and section of forest. When an organism enters the estate for the first time, all cataracts, floaters, and other visual impairments disappear until the ending of the next sunrise. This effect cannot be reactivated.
**收容日期：** 20-12-2022
**所在地：** 50 kilometers from Cluj-Napoca, Cluj County, Romania
**安全协议：** Converted into a Foundation Area-838 for use in the lodging of agents and persons of interest.
**备注：** UE-456838's anomalous properties were discovered after the death of ████████ ██████ (05/06/1933-11/12/2022), the former owner. Notably, ██████ had only owned the estate for three months, having purchased it from an unknown buyer just weeks before the passing of his wife, ████ ██████ (23/08/1936-01/10/2022). ████ ██████ was known to be blind. Investigation of the estate found her body buried by the lake. Use of Area-838 funds to obtain ████████ ██████'s remains were approved, and ████████ has been interred with ████ ██████.

**未解明地点 UE-175006**
**Description** A large structure that is identical to the fictional map of "gm_construct" from sandbox video game Garry's Mod.[[footnote]] Also known as Gmod. [[/footnote]] Structure has no anomalous properties apart from location and carbon dating, which suggests it is 450,000~ years old.
**收容日期：** 11-09-2021
**所在地：** -43.392134, 99.262485, Indian Ocean
**安全协议：** Due to the remote location, being far from land and submerged, containment is deemed unnecessary. Facepunch studios is monitored for a potential connection to the anomaly.

**未解明地点 UE-204606**
**地点描述：** A 15 centimeter space between a wall and a sink in the southwest corner of a male public bathroom. Individuals that partially enter this space and remain in it for 7.34 seconds will suddenly be launched out in an ascending angle, at a speed of 440 km/h.

Lorsch residents claiming to witness a small, flying figure in the sky must be interviewed and amnesticized. A search for Heinz S. Eichinger’s corpse remains ongoing.

**安全协议：** Patch of grass that grew over it appears to be sufficient in obscuring its effects. Shrubbery planted over as additional precaution.

**未解明地点 UE-505022**

**收容日期：** ██/██/2000
**所在地：** Pacific Ocean, 111 kilometers East of Nauru

**未解明地点 UE-777066**

**所在地：** ███████, Bayerns, Germany

**未解明地点 UE-14960**

Due to affected lifeforms appearing extremely similar to 'normal' life, no further security is deemed necessary. Researcher Joseph █████ and his team have been assigned to studying the area.

**未解明地点 UE-107793**

**未解明地点 UE-194907**
**Description** A 20-meter by 20-meter patch of dirt in the center of a forest with 2 large rectangular mirrors facing each other on opposite ends of the patch. Both mirrors stand up straight and as of yet have not been able to be brought down. When a being capable of perception enters between the mirrors, their bodies are physically broken down into photons as the mirrors multiply, causing the photons to be spread equally between them until the photons have been completely absorbed. After the absorption of the photons, the effect ceases and the mirrors regain their position. All subjects used in testing have been lost.
**Date of Discovery** 03/14/2023
**Location**██████, Russia
**Security protocol** A 10 acre plot of land containing the location has been bought by SCP front company "████████", and a barbed wire fence has been constructed around the perimeter. Large draps have been placed over the mirrors, which have stopped their effects so far.

**未解明地点 UE-164600**
**Description** A bicycle tract 6 kilometers in length that induces advanced psychosis and prominent antisocial tendencies in those who travel on it for [REDACTED]
These alterations to the psyche are seemingly irreversible.
**Date of Discovery** 03/23/2023
**Location**██████, Oregon, USA
**安全协议：** The location of the path has been scrubbed from public records, locked from the public, and guarded at all times to prevent trespassing.

**未解明地点 UE-799564**
**地点描述：** A mountainous region on the west coast of Britain, with an area of approximately 20,779 km^^2^^, known locally as //Cymru// or //Wales//. The country, part of the UK currently, has its own language[[footnote]]Related to the apparently non-anomalous languages Cornish and Breton[[/footnote]], culture, extensively documented history dating back to the post-Roman era, and a population of over three million inhabitants; however it appears not to have existed before some time in 1998CE. Anomaly was discovered during a clean-out of archival materials at Site-██ in which a staff member found, in a room adjacent to a Scranton Reality Anchor, a number of Ordinance Survey maps dating from 1945-1987CE that appear to show the island of Britain terminating at what is now considered the border with Wales. Further examination of available archival materials stored within the SRA's radius of effect lack of any mention nor depictions of the country of Wales if brought onto the site prior to 1998.
**收容日期：** NA
**所在地：** Wales, UK
**安全协议：** As effect appears to have global penetration outwith areas under constant SRA usage during the 1998-2003 period, security is limited to control of Foundation Owned documentation that displays the country's apparent former lack of existence. 
**备注：** Junior Researcher Tom Evans has requested amnestic treatment and transfer due to emotional upset, related to memories of spending summers with his grandparents in Pontypridd during the 1980s.

**未解明地点 UE-57496473**
**地点描述：** A valley that is about 4 kilometers long. Physical scale duplicates of pyramidal structures not constructed in Egypt have been found there. These include Koh Ker, the Castillo, the Ryugyong Hotel, the Bass Pro Shop Pyramid, and the Luxor Hotel & Casino. All of these structures are abandoned and have sustained years of sand damage. 
**发现日期：** 9/19/2007
**Location** The Western Desert, Egypt
**安全协议：** It is now scrubbed from all maps and guarded from public intrusion. Site-667 has been established in the duplicate Luxor Hotel & Casino for security purposes and for regional operations.

**未解明地点 UE-1000543**
**地点描述：** An abandoned house belonging to an unidentified middle-ranking GOI-004[[footnote]]Church of the Broken God[[/footnote]] member. The house has been extensively "booby-trapped" with anomalous means and in such complexity that not only triggering one trap would set off the entire location, but could lead to a potentially catastrophic anomalous event up to a localized reality failure.
**发现日期：** 12/05/2017
**Location** Malang, East Java, Indonesia
**安全协议：** The neighborhood surrounding the house has been acquired and established as an exclusion zone, with 4 SRAs installed in a perimeter. Personnel assigned are also tasked to maintain normalcy by acting as local residents and maintaining a veil of day-to-day activity. To this end, D-class personnel are also assigned to bulk up the number of "residents" on the site.

**未解明地点 UE-1014576**
**地点描述：** An area encompassing the entirety of Kingman Reef (0.03 km^^2^^) in which all firearms which enter the location will immediately explode. A sign was found planted in the sand which read "Be nice" and has since been removed.
**发现日期：** 18/02/23
**所在地：** Kingman Reef, Oceania
**安全协议：** Due to how remote the location is, no action beyond surveillance by satellite is necessary. 

**Unexplained Locations UE-1014577 and UE-1014578** 
**地点描述：** Sixteen burial plots and their inhabitants in an unnamed rural █████, Texas (US) cemetary have (apparently permanently) switched places with sixteen burial plots and their inhabitants in █████ █████cemetary on the Isle of Man, United Kingdom. There are a number of interesting coincidences. (1) In both cases, no records exist for the establishment of these cemetaries, with the graves transferred dating between 1846 and 1918. (2) No given date of birth postdates 1899. (3) There are no known living relatives of the individuals interred.  (4) Eight of the graves, in each case, were combat fatalities.   Appropriate records have been altered. Whilst no living relatives of the deceased have been identified, anyone associated with the cemetaries has been appropriately amnesticized. The Foundation is in the process of exhuming and examining the remains of the transferred individuals, under the cover of an attempt to identify strains of Yellow Fever in victims before 1919.
**发现日期：** 1/1/2018  
**所在地：** █████ County Texas,  United States;  Isle of Man, United Kingdom.
**备注：** //My father died in the Falklands Conflict. We've done our best to ensure that these individuals are appropriately honored and their remains treated with respect, both in regards to the combat dead and the other folks who seem to have been taken along for the ride. - Dr. May//

**未解明地点 UE-4948295**
**地点描述：** A region of space, roughly 2.5cm x 2.5cm x 2.5cm, where all matter undergoes instant CPT reversal. The resulting antimatter does not react with any matter directly outside the space, and the process instantly reverts when the matter is removed. This same process is theorized to happen in reverse when used with antimatter, but there is currently no way of confirming this.
**发现日期：** 9/6/2004
**所在地：** Earth-Sun L4 Lagrange Point
**安全协议：** As no detectable effects occur, obfuscation and redirection efforts have been deemed unnecessary. The location is monitored for any emergent behavior.

**发现日期：** 2023-07-24
**所在地：** X:-██,███,███, Z:+██,███,███, Minecraft
**安全协议：** Foundation webcrawlers trained to analyze Minecraft-related content for mentions of anomaly, though its remote and insignificant location make rediscovery virtually impossible. [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/secure-facility-dossier-site-418 Site-418] tasked with analyzing location in as many world seeds as feasible until the entirety of Holly's speech is available for Foundation research into the Fifth Church.

**未解明地点 UE-787370**

**所在地：** 63°██'██"N 27°██'██"E, █ kilometers from Sonkajärvi, Northern Savonia, Finland

**未解明地点 UE-628426**
**地点描述：** A classroom in █████ Hall in which all media containing Canadian actor Nathan Fillion (1971-) is altered so as to remove any character acted or voiced by him. This typically greatly eases the plot beyond what would be expected and eventually leads to better endings for all protagonist characters, even those who never interacted with Fillion's character(s). The notable exceptions to this are //Firefly// (2002) and //Serenity// (2005), in which his character of Malcolm Reynolds is replaced with an often unseen "Captain Espinanegra" and other characters are significantly more hostile and/or distressed. Additionally, all plotlines are either shortened or outright removed, leading to the altered //Firefly// having only six episodes.

**所在地：** Classroom 3██, █████ Hall, █████████ University, Canada
**安全协议：** Classroom closed indefinitely for repairs. Film classes and media club which used the room interrogated, amnesticized, and transferred to other suitable classrooms.

**所在地：** 48°53'██" S, 169°16'██" W, approximately ████ meters below the surface
**安全协议：** Due to the remoteness of UE-963640, containment is unnecessary and impractical. Samples of all blocks have been gathered, analyzed, and stored.

**未解明地点 UE-1123122**
**地点描述：** The master bedroom, located on the 2nd story of Dr. █████████'s residence. Once every 4 days, a pale, hairless humanoid entity will appear on the bed, sitting in a cross-legged position with its hands on its lap and its head down. The entity does not respond to any external stimuli and will remain in this position. After roughly 3 hours, the entity vanishes.
**发现日期：** July 1st, 1999.
**发现地点：** ███████, New Mexico, USA.
**安全协议：** At no point are any civilians to be allowed to enter UE-1123122 under any circumstances.

**未解明地点 UE-2142211**
**地点描述：** A █████████ that censors any form of documentation attempting to describe it or its location. Effects extends to verbal communication of the █████████.
**发现日期：**  9/30/2020
**发现地点：** ██████, ████████.
**安全协议：** Surrounded by an electric fence.

**未解明地点 UE-7608331**
**地点描述：** A spatial anomaly within a building's emergency stairs, linking the top of the 13th floor to the bottom of the 2nd floor. Walking up beyond this places one at the bottom stair, and walking down places one at the top stair, with no discontinuity or realization that a spatial shift took place.

The same staircase accessed from other floors do not exhibit this anomaly, but walking into the affected region places one into the spatial anomaly.

Of note, a Nokia mobile phone has been perpetually falling in the gap between the stairs. It is unknown if this is related to the anomalous effect; in the interest of containment it has been left in-place with high-speed photography used for analysis.
**发现日期：**  2018/10/03
**发现地点：** ██████, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
**安全协议：** Stairwell sealed off, alternate emergency stairs constructed adjacent.

**未解明地点 UE-76083342**
**地点描述：** A static temporal anomaly, believed to be linked to a piece of technology, slowing the time in a sphere 5 meters in diameter to a mere billionth of the speed of the rest of the world. Due to the extreme nature of the time dilation effect, entry into the sphere is not physically possible.

Contained within the sphere are two operatives bearing imagery characteristic of the Chaos Insurgency, who are engaged in a close-quarters firefight with two mercenaries of the Chopin Group. One of the Chaos Insurgency operatives is holding an unidentified device in his left hand. 

Two 5.56mm bullets are currently suspended in the air, having been fired by the rifles wielded by the Chopin Group mercenaries.

The cause of this conflict is not known.

The location of the conflict is within an enclosed concrete parking garage.
**发现日期：**  2000/4/14
**发现地点：** ██████, Poland
**安全协议：** Location has been purchased by the Foundation and cordoned off from civilian trespassing.

进展 1 - 2006/4/20: //The first bullet has left the temporal anomaly, impacting the back wall of the parking garage.//

进展 2 - 2009/2/26: //The second bullet has left the temporal anomaly, impacting one the positioned ballistic shields placed by the Foundation.//

进展 3 - 2015/12/17: //The structure containing the anomaly collapsed unexpectedly. Excavation underway.//

进展 4 - 2015/12/24: //After one week of searching the anomaly has been determined to remain intact. Tent established over the anomaly.//

进展 5 - 2020/1/24: //A 9mm bullet has been seen inside of the barrel of one of the handguns held by the Chaos Insurgency operative.//

进展 6 - 2023/11/30: //The anomaly has ceased. The location individuals within is not known. Several drops of blood have been found in the location of the anomaly.//

**未解明地点 UE-011235**
**地点描述：** An abandoned establishment known as the "Winter Willow" orphanage recurrently produces distressing auditory phenomena, notably characterized by unsettling noises and disturbing children's screams annually at midnight on Christmas Eve. Despite extensive investigations conducted within the premises, no identifiable source for these sounds has been conclusively determined.
**发现日期：** 2023-03-05
**所在地：** ███████, El Naria
**安全协议：** A perimeter extending 2 kilometers around the orphanage was designated as restricted access. The orphanage premises underwent complete enclosure, with all entrances and windows sealed off. Surveillance equipment was strategically positioned inside the facility to monitor and record any unusual or anomalous occurrences.
**备注：** //The fingerprint samples obtained from the site precisely correspond to those attributed to [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4666 SCP-████]. –Dr. Starfield//

**未解明地点 UE-838992**
**地点描述：** A circle of nine statues arranged in various poses around an altar. An inscription on each of the statues reads in Irish, "Until the end of time, you will be as stone. As punishment for a crime, for which you cannot atone." A similar inscription on the altar reads, "In honor of the Mother of the Rose and Queen of the Night Sky, Azura, this shrine has been erected, as gratitude for saving me from the Red Lord and his forces. May her will be done." It is worth noting that the altar and the inscription are at least 1000 years old. 
**发现日期：** 2024-01-11
**安全协议：** Altar and statues described as freak modern art from 2002. Radiological dating methods are to be tampered with, so as to conceal the true age of the structure. 
**备注：** //The inscription on the altar refers to a deity from a video game series. Possible connection to [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1936 Daleport] and Hedaphic legends. In the meantime, further study on Hedaphic lore is required. -Dr. Strix Direnni//

**Unexplained Location UE-278710**
**Description:** An underground burial site, fully furnished according to the customs of the █████, an ancient Daevite splinter group. Notably, there is no evidence of human remains having ever been buried at the site. Within a metal safe-box hidden under the main mound, several anomalous or anachronistic objects were discovered:
* Clay tablets, Mesopotamian origin. They have been wiped clean.
* A lead orb. It glows faintly when near a corpse of any species.
* A rusted-over phonograph player.
* A Sony Walkman.
* An unknown electronic device, similar in composition to smartphones, but matching no known construction. It is inoperable.
* [[[scp-5871|An obsidian knife]]], along with ritual instructions.
**Date of Discovery:** 1831/04/10
**Location:** [REDACTED], Mongolia
**Security Protocol:** Initially, none. The area is remote, and the Foundation at the time was too ill-equipped to set up a permanent presence there. Beginning in 1931, Outpost-871 was set up at the location, and in 1974, protocols changed to leave it largely unmanned and monitored remotely. However, starting in 2050, containment requirements are slated to change to require a full security complement present at all times.

**Unexplained Location UE-301729**
**Description:** An irregular area of space, NNW of The Great Pyramid of Giza, where it is presumed that an alternate reality is shown: approximately 40% of the pyramid is missing, all other surrounding structures including the nearby city of Cairo and the other pyramids are missing; the sky is colored with various shades of red; the sand is a dull grey; and a black, spherical object approximately 131 meters in diameter can be seen above the Pyramid emitting a bright red glow. A faint "rumbling hum" can also be heard within the anomaly from all angles.
**Date of Discovery:**  9/09/2022
**Location of Discovery:** ~100 Meters above ██°██'██.█"N ██°██'██.█"E
**Security Protocols:** Precautions are to be taken so that no aircraft enter the anomaly.

**Unexplained Location UE-577730**
**Description:** A disused tin mine in which footwear dating from the 1930's and earlier randomly materialise, all showing appropriate levels of degredation. Footwear is not restricted to those that would have been found locally.
**Date of Discovery:** 17/01/2019
**Location of Discovery:** Marazion, Cornwall, UK.
**Security Protocols:** Mine shaft sealed off and warnings of cave-ins dispersed. All materialised footwear is to be removed, logged and stored in Site-104.

**Unexplained Location UE-889770**
**Description:** A 30 yard radius roughly spherical area surrounding a wooden dock at shore. If any firearm enters this area, it will transform into an avian species roughly around the size of said firearm and attempt to fly away from the area, usually towards the ocean.
**Date of Discovery:** 1983-██-██
**Location:** █████, California
**Security Protocol:** General area of shoreline was blocked off from public access and a cover up story was deployed stating the area was closed due to being used for toxic waste management. Security cameras in bushes and sand have been set up to watch for any civilians who would shortly be amnesticized upon discovery of entry. Attempts to locate anomalously transformed firearms have been unsuccessful.
